title: Investing, Gaming, And Cybersecurity
itunes:title: Investing, Gaming, And Cybersecurity
description:
Jay Bryson, Wells Fargo Chief Economist, discusses markets and gives his economic outlook for 2022. Andy Paul, CEO of Corsair Gaming, discusses gaming streaming and computer hardware. Guy Davis, Managing Director and Portfolio Manager at GCI Investors, talks about investing strategies amid inflation and interest rate hikes. Christy Wyatt, President and CEO of Absolute Software Corp., discusses ransomware, cybersecurity, and company earnings. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
